title: Microsoft warns of new remote access trojan targeting crypto wallets
body: Tech giant Microsoft has discovered a new remote access trojan (RAT) that targets crypto held in 20 cryptocurrency wallet extensions for the Google Chrome browser. Microsoft’s Incident Response Team said in a March 17 blog post that it first discovered the malware StilachiRAT last November and found it can steal information such as credentials stored in the browser, digital wallet information and data stored in the clipboard. After deployment, the bad actors can use StilachiRAT to siphon crypto wallet data by scanning for the configuration information for 20 crypto wallet extensions, including Coinbase Wallet, Trust Wallet, MetaMask and OKX Wallet. The malware StilachiRAT can target crypto held in 20 different wallet extensions. Source: Microsoft “Analysis of the StilachiRAT’s WWStartupCtrl64.dll module that contains the RAT capabilities revealed the use of various methods to steal information from the target system,” Microsoft said. Among its other capabilities, the malware can extract credentials saved in the Google Chrome local state file and monitor clipboard activity for sensitive information like passwords and crypto keys . It can also use detection evasion and anti-forensics features, like the ability to clear event logs and check for signs it’s running in a sandbox to block analysis attempts, according to Microsoft. At the moment, the tech giant says it can’t pinpoint who is behind the malware but hopes that publicly sharing information will lower the number of people who might be snared. Related: New MassJacker malware targets piracy users, steals crypto “Based on Microsoft’s current visibility, the malware does not exhibit widespread distribution at this time,” Microsoft said. “However, due to its stealth capabilities and the rapid changes within the malware ecosystem, we are sharing these findings as part of our ongoing efforts to monitor, analyze, and report on the evolving threat landscape.” Microsoft suggests to avoid falling prey to malware; users should have antivirus software, cloud-based anti-phishing and anti-malware components on their devices. Losses to crypto scams, exploits and hacks totaled nearly $1.53 billion in February , with the $1.4 billion Bybit hack accounting for the lion’s share of losses, according to blockchain security firm CertiK. Blockchain analytics firm Chainalysis said in its 2025 Crypto Crime Report that crypto crime has entered a professionalized era dominated by AI-driven scams, stablecoin laundering, and efficient cyber syndicates, with the past year witnessing $51 billion in illicit transaction volume. title: Exclusive: Gemini Fortifies Leadership with Morgan Stanley CFO Amidst Crypto IPO Speculation
body: In a move signaling ambitious growth and potential public market aspirations, cryptocurrency exchange giant Gemini has onboarded Dan Chen, a seasoned financial executive from Morgan Stanley, as its new Chief Financial Officer (CFO). This strategic appointment arrives amidst swirling rumors of a potential Initial Public Offering (IPO) for Gemini, adding fuel to the fire of anticipation within the crypto community. Is this the definitive step towards Gemini going public? Let’s dive into the details of this exciting development. Why Gemini’s CFO Hire is a Game Changer for Crypto IPO Aspirations The appointment of Dan Chen is not just another corporate shuffle; it’s a calculated maneuver that speaks volumes about Gemini’s future trajectory. Chen brings a wealth of experience from traditional finance powerhouses like Morgan Stanley and MetLife Investments. His background is deeply rooted in managing complex financial operations and navigating the intricacies of established financial markets. Here’s why this is significant for Gemini and the broader crypto landscape: Traditional Finance Expertise: Chen’s pedigree from Morgan Stanley injects a dose of traditional financial rigor into Gemini’s leadership. This is crucial as crypto firms increasingly seek legitimacy and acceptance from mainstream investors. IPO Readiness: Hiring a CFO with IPO experience, especially from a firm like Morgan Stanley known for its IPO prowess, strongly suggests Gemini is serious about going public. Chen’s expertise will be invaluable in preparing Gemini for the scrutiny and compliance demands of an IPO. Investor Confidence: A CFO from a reputable institution like Morgan Stanley can significantly boost investor confidence. It signals to both institutional and retail investors that Gemini is maturing and adopting best practices in financial management. Strategic Financial Planning: Beyond IPOs, a seasoned CFO is essential for strategic financial planning, managing growth, and ensuring long-term financial health. Chen’s role will be pivotal in steering Gemini through the volatile crypto market and positioning it for sustained success. Decoding the Crypto IPO Buzz: Is Gemini Next? Bloomberg’s report on Gemini considering an crypto IPO has ignited intense speculation. While Gemini has not officially confirmed these plans, the timing of Chen’s appointment is hard to ignore. An IPO would mark a significant milestone for Gemini and the cryptocurrency industry as a whole. Let’s consider what an IPO could mean for Gemini: Potential Benefits of a Gemini IPO Potential Challenges of a Gemini IPO Capital Infusion: An IPO could raise substantial capital for Gemini to fuel expansion, innovation, and acquisitions. Enhanced Credibility: Public listing would enhance Gemini’s credibility and transparency, attracting a broader range of investors. Liquidity for Early Investors: An IPO provides liquidity for early investors and employees holding equity. Brand Recognition: Going public can significantly boost brand recognition and market presence. Regulatory Scrutiny: Public companies face intense regulatory scrutiny and reporting requirements. Market Volatility: Crypto market volatility can impact stock price and investor confidence post-IPO. Short-Term Pressure: Public companies are subject to quarterly earnings pressure, potentially hindering long-term strategic decisions. Compliance Costs: Maintaining public company compliance is expensive and resource-intensive. Morgan Stanley Executive to Crypto CFO: A Growing Trend? Dan Chen’s move from Morgan Stanley executive to Gemini CFO is part of a broader trend of traditional finance professionals migrating to the cryptocurrency sector. This influx of talent underscores the increasing maturity and institutionalization of the crypto market. Why are we seeing this shift? Crypto’s Growth Potential: Traditional finance professionals recognize the immense growth potential of the cryptocurrency industry and are seeking opportunities in this burgeoning space. Innovation and Disruption: The crypto sector is at the forefront of financial innovation and disruption, attracting individuals who want to be part of cutting-edge developments. Higher Compensation and Equity: Crypto companies often offer competitive compensation packages, including equity, which can be highly lucrative, especially in rapidly growing firms. Desire for Change: Some professionals are seeking a change from the traditional, often rigid structures of established financial institutions and are drawn to the more dynamic and entrepreneurial environment of crypto companies. What Does This Mean for the Cryptocurrency Exchange Landscape? Gemini’s strategic hire of a seasoned cryptocurrency exchange CFO and potential IPO aspirations could have ripple effects across the industry. It could: Set a Precedent: Gemini potentially going public could pave the way for other major crypto exchanges to follow suit, further legitimizing the industry. Increase Competition: A publicly traded Gemini could become an even more formidable competitor, intensifying competition among crypto exchanges. Attract Institutional Investment: Publicly listed crypto exchanges could attract more significant institutional investment, driving further market growth. Drive Regulatory Clarity: The process of going public may necessitate and encourage greater regulatory clarity for the crypto industry. Actionable Insights: What to Watch For For crypto enthusiasts and investors, here are some actionable insights to consider: Monitor Gemini’s IPO Developments: Keep a close eye on any official announcements from Gemini regarding their IPO plans. This could be a significant event for the crypto market. Analyze Gemini’s Financial Performance: As Gemini moves towards potential public listing, pay attention to their financial reports and performance metrics. Observe Industry Trends: Track the broader trend of traditional finance executives moving to crypto and the potential for more crypto IPOs. Consider Investment Opportunities: If Gemini goes public, evaluate it as a potential investment opportunity, considering both the risks and rewards of the crypto market. Conclusion: Gemini’s Bold Move Sets the Stage for a Thrilling Chapter Gemini’s appointment of Dan Chen as CFO is a powerful signal of its ambitions and maturity. Coupled with the whispers of a potential IPO, it paints a picture of a company poised for significant growth and mainstream integration. This move not only strengthens Gemini’s leadership but also underscores the evolving landscape of the cryptocurrency industry, where traditional finance expertise and digital asset innovation are increasingly converging. The coming months promise to be incredibly exciting as we watch Gemini’s next steps unfold and witness the potential transformation of the crypto exchange market. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Crypto.com faces backlash after last-minute vote approves minting 70 billion CRO
body: Crypto exchange Crypto.com has come under fire after a last-minute voting surge secured approval for its controversial proposal to mint 70 billion CRO tokens. According to a report from Unchained, the proposal had struggled to reach the required 33.4% quorum for most of the voting period. However, in the final hours, a sudden influx of 3.35 billion Cronos ( CRO ) votes pushed it past the threshold, securing a 61.18% approval. The proposal in question was aimed at creating a Cronos Strategic Reserve by effectively reversing a 2021 token burn that was meant to remove the same number of tokens from circulation permanently Crypto.com argued that reinstating these tokens would support the long-term growth of the Cronos ecosystem and help fund initiatives like AI-driven applications and a potential CRO-based exchange-traded fund. The newly minted CRO will be placed in an escrow wallet and released over a five-year vesting schedule. The reserve will reportedly follow strict controls, including adjustments to CRO’s emission parameters to prevent inflation from affecting validator rewards. Critics have argued that reviving previously burned tokens undermines trust and raises concerns about Cronos’ decentralization. (See below.) https://twitter.com/Wyll_BBK/status/1896452917722296775 Another community member slammed the decision, calling it proof that Cronos operates as a centralized entity. They argued that only Crypto.com’s core team would back such a move. You might also like: Crypto.com joins CF Benchmarks, enhancing Bitcoin and Ethereum indices Most independent validators opposed the plan, but Crypto.com’s own validators, including Starship, Falcon Heavy, Electron, Antares, and Minotaur IV, ultimately tipped the scales in its favor. According to Unchained, until Mar. 10, only two of the company’s validators, Starship and Falcon Heavy, had backed the proposal. By the time voting closed, they were joined by three more Crypto.com-run validators—Electron, Antares, and Minotaur IV. While a few independent validators, including Cosmostation and Polkachu.com, also voted in support, their influence was minimal compared to Crypto.com’s internal votes. One large CRO holder told Unchained they were concerned that Crypto.com’s last-minute votes set a precedent where projects with enough validator control could push decisions through despite opposition. With the proposal now approved, the Cronos blockchain is set to undergo an upgrade that will officially mint the 70 billion tokens. However, frustration among CRO holders remains high, with some calling the decision a betrayal of the original burn commitment. Further, on the same day voting ended, Crypto.com introduced a proposal to burn 50 million CRO, which is just 0.07% of the newly minted supply. The move drew further criticism, with a CRO validator calling it a “spit in all CRO holders’ faces.” Meanwhile, CRO has been on a downward trend since the vote passed, sliding over 3% to $0.08 at the time of writing. crypto.news reached out to Crypto.com for comment but had not received a response at the time of publication. Read more: Kraken and Crypto.com to launch proprietary stablecoins in 2025

title: LIBRA Token Lawsuit: $107 Million Scandal Hits Crypto Insiders
body: A class-action lawsuit has been filed in New York, accusing the developers of the LIBRA token of deceiving investors and manipulating its launch for personal gain.

title: New York-based Burwick Law files class action lawsuit over LIBRA token launch
body: Burwick Law has filed a class action lawsuit in New York against Kelsier Ventures, KIP Protocol, and Meteora, accusing them of running a deceptive launch in the LIBRA token scandal. According to the lawsuit filed on Mar. 18, the token’s developers secretly manipulated liquidity to defraud retail traders of millions of dollars while misleading investors with false promises. LIBRA was marketed as an initiative to boost Argentina’s economy, even getting President Javier Milei’s support. However, the token’s developers allegedly inflated prices using a one-sided liquidity pool rather than a fair launch. Tonight, our firm filed a class action complaint in the Supreme Court of New York on behalf of our client. We allege that Kelsier, KIP, Meteora, and related parties orchestrated an unfair token launch ($LIBRA), allegedly misleading purchasers and harming retail investors. pic.twitter.com/H7dD2LaARK — Burwick Law (@BurwickLaw) March 18, 2025 To maintain control over the token’s value, they withheld 85% of its supply. Insiders allegedly withdrew $107 million when trading began, resulting in a 94% price collapse. Court documents claim this allowed insiders to “discreetly and systematically extract stable assets” from unsuspecting buyers. You might also like: Memecoin market cap surges 5% as prosecutor aims to freeze $110m in LIBRA assets In addition to seeking restitution for impacted investors, Burwick Law hopes to stop future scams of this nature. In a similar development, on Mar. 12, Argentine attorney Gregorio Dalbón requested an Interpol Red Notice for Hayden Davis, the CEO of Kelsier, claiming that his wealth would allow him to escape. A Red Notice is essentially an Interpol alert requesting global law enforcement to locate and provisionally arrest a person pending extradition. The LIBRA token launched on Solana ( SOL ) in Feb. 14 and quickly reached a $4.4 billion market cap before crashing, wiping out over $280 million in value across nearly 75,000 traders. Dubbed “Cryptogate,” the controversy has given rise to multiple allegations of insider trading and market manipulation. According to a Mar. 14 report by Crypto.news, insiders such as Kelsier Ventures were able to access LIBRA tokens before the public launch, making more than $100 million through early trades and liquidity provision. Beyond legal action, the Libra memecoin scandal has garnered political attention. Opposition politicians in Argentina have called for Milei’s impeachment, citing allegations of fraud. Analysts say the crisis could hurt Milei’s image as a leader focused on economic recovery and fighting corruption as the midterm elections approach later this year. Read more: From Trump tokens to LIBRA lows: Meme coin circus rolls on, bolstered by recent SEC ruling

title: Bitcoin Price Prediction 2025: Can BTC Follow Gold’s Rally to New Highs?

The flagship coin has been attempting to regain bullish sentiment after being trapped in a bearish outlook since the second inauguration of U.S. President Donald Trump Donald Trump Donald Trump is an American former president politician, businessman, and media personality, who served as the 45th president of the U.S. between 2017 to 2021. Trump earned a Bachelor of science in economics from the University of Pennsylvania in 1968. Trump won the 2016 presidential election as the Republican Party nominee against Democratic Party nominee Hillary Clinton while losing the popular vote. As president, Trump ordered a travel ban on citizens from several Muslim-majority countries, diverted military funding toward building a wall on the U.S.–Mexico border, and implemented a family separation policy. Trump has remained a prominent figure in the Republican Party and is considered a likely candidate for the 2024 presidential election President which turned out to be a classic sell-the-news event. The crowd’s fear of Bitcoin’s potential dip below $80k again is still evident as the BTC fear and greed index hovers around 34 percent. However, the lack of major FUD in the market could rekindle hope for a bullish rebound toward price discovery soon. Consequently, gold price has rallied around 4 percent in the last five days to hit its all-time high (ATH) of about $3,017 per ounce on Tuesday, March 18, during the early European session. After five weeks of conservative cash outflows, the U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs might end the losing streak. On Monday, none of the U.S. spot BTC ETF issuers recorded a net cash outflow. title: Metaplanet issues another set of 0% ordinary bonds to purchase more Bitcoin
body: Japanese investment firm Metaplanet has issued another set of 0% ordinary bonds to EVO FUND, worth $13.35 million, with the aim of buying more Bitcoin. According to a recent notice , the Tokyo-based investment firm is issuing ¥2 billion to EVO FUND, based on a decision made at the company’s board of directors meeting. This marks the ninth issuance of ordinary bonds by the Japanese firm overall. In a Mar. 18 regulatory filing, it is stated that the funds gained from the ordinary bonds issuance will be used to purchase more Bitcoin ( BTC ). This decision is in line with the firm’s ongoing strategy to grow its BTC holdings as one of the largest corporate Bitcoin holders in Asia. The bonds carry no interest and can be redeemed in full on Sept. 17, at ¥100 per ¥100 of the bonds’ face value. However, EVO FUND is granted the option to redeem the bonds before the redemption date by providing a written notice to Metaplanet at least one business day before the desired date. Early redemption can be made for all or part of the outstanding bonds. You might also like: Metaplanet issues $13.6m in ordinary bonds to buy more Bitcoin The funds required for the redemption of the bonds will come from the proceeds of the 14th to 17th Series of Stock Acquisition Rights, which Metaplanet expects to exercise. The bond issuance will be fully allocated to EVO FUND, with no guarantee or collateral attached to the bonds. Despite the bond issuance, Metaplanet’s shares dipped by nearly 0.5% to a price of ¥4,030, according to Google Finance . Earlier on Feb. 27, Metaplanet also issued ordinary bonds to EVO FUND at the same amount of ¥2 billion, which were worth $13.6 million at the time. The investment firm declared that the funds would be used to purchase more Bitcoin. Since April 2024, Metaplanet has been gradually acquiring more BTC after it launched its own Bitcoin Treasury Operations. Most recently on March 12, the firm purchased 162 BTC, which brought its total holdings to 3,050 BTC or equal to over $251 million at current market prices. Read more: Bitcoin-focused Metaplanet’s total holdings break through 3k BTC

title: Crypto News: $32.6 Million Bitcoin Pyramid Scheme Dismantled by Spanish Authorities
body: The post Crypto News: $32.6 Million Bitcoin Pyramid Scheme Dismantled by Spanish Authorities appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Spanish police have successfully dismantled a massive Bitcoin-themed cryptocurrency pyramid scheme that defrauded over 3,600 victims out of approximately $32.6 million. The operation, led by Spain’s National Police Corps (CNP) , resulted in the arrest of eight individuals across multiple cities, including Malaga, Madrid, and Meria. The group, consisting of various professionals such as marketing experts and web designers, ran a complex operation that promoted fake Bitcoin investment plans to unsuspecting individuals, many of whom had no prior knowledge of cryptocurrencies. The scam operators made it simple for victims to convert large sums of money, often hundreds or thousands of euros, into Bitcoin. Some victims were even manipulated into surrendering control of their electronic devices, enabling the scammers to perform crypto transfers and steal personal and banking information. Growing Threat of Scams The police first learned of the scheme in 2022 when a victim filed a complaint in Murcia, and the investigation revealed a fraudulent network in which new investors’ funds were used to pay older investors, a typical characteristic of a pyramid scheme. The CNP found that the scammers had promised unrealistic returns of 40% after one month and up to 300% after a year. Investigators discovered substantial Bitcoin holdings in the criminals’ wallets, as well as a worthless token they issued to investors. The scam affected victims across 36 countries, with the majority of the victims residing in Spain. In response, the authorities froze 73 bank accounts, seized vehicles, and impounded cash and computer equipment. The operation serves as a reminder of the risks of unregulated crypto investments and the growing threat of scams in the industry.

title: Pi Network Price Slips 17%: Here’s Why Pi Coin Is Falling
body: Pi Network price slipped about 17% today, indicating a waning risk-bet appetite of the investors. Despite the buzz around the coin, the crypto has recorded significant losses lately, especially due to a lack of major announcements and updates regarding the token. Amid this, a Pi Coin enthusiast has revealed key reasons that might have triggered the recent selloff in the market. Pi Network Price Slips 17% Pi Network was one of the top laggards in the crypto market today, sparking concerns among traders. Pi Coin value was down more than 17% and exchanged hands at $1.16, while its one-day trading volume rose 54% to $551 million. Notably, the latest loss comes as a huge Pi token unlock looms . For context, the unlock eventually increases the supply, causing pressure on the price. Besides, it has dampened the traders’ sentiment, resulting in the recent decline in the value. Pi Coin Faces Major Selloff Amid Investor Concerns Pi Coin’s recent price plunge has left many investors questioning the project’s long-term viability. Enthusiasts note that the drop directly correlates with declining public sentiment. One of the key triggers was Pi’s failure to secure a Binance listing, despite 86% of its community voting in favor. This rejection has shaken investor confidence, further pressuring the token. Adding to the concerns, the Pi Core Team failed to deliver any groundbreaking updates on Pi Day, a crucial event for the community. Many early miners, who have supported the project for years, are now openly criticizing the team for the lack of visible progress. With the project in development for six years, frustrations are mounting as expectations remain unfulfilled. Lack of Development Roadmap Raises Red Flags A major complaint among Pi Coin investors is the absence of a clear roadmap for the Open Mainnet launch. Unlike other crypto projects that provide transparent timelines, Pi Network has remained vague about its future developments. This uncertainty has led to growing skepticism, with some fearing that the project may never reach full decentralization. In a recent social media post, Pi enthusiast Dr Altcoin pointed out that the crypto’s ranking has fallen to #13, with its price dropping below $1.30. He emphasized that the declining value reflects the community’s disappointment in the project’s progress. Without a roadmap, investors remain hesitant, leading to increased sell-offs. Community Demands Transparency & Progress The Pi Network community is calling for immediate action from the core team. Investors believe that for Pi Network price to regain momentum, the team must address the lack of trust by: Releasing a clear Open Mainnet roadmap. Launching the long-awaited 100 decentralized applications (DApps). Disclosing key investors and partnerships. According to Dr Altcoin, these steps are crucial in restoring faith in the project and preventing further price declines. Without transparency and real progress, Pi Coin risks losing more support. However, a recent Pi price analysis hints at a 3X rally if Binance lists the token on its platform. The post Pi Network Price Slips 17%: Here’s Why Pi Coin Is Falling appeared first on CoinGape .
tags: 24/7 Cryptocurrency News|Altcoin News|Pi Coin|Pi coin price|Pi Network|Pi Network Price

title: Aptos Movemaker Launches US$2 Million Grant Program and Exclusive Co-Working Space for Builders in Hong Kong
body: Hong Kong, Hong Kong, March 18th, 2025, Chainwire Movemaker , the official community organization of the Aptos Foundation dedicated to advancing the Aptos ecosystem in Chinese-speaking regions, has announced the launch of Movemaker Grant Program and the opening of Aptos Space, a state-of-the-art collaboration hub in Hong Kong. These initiatives underscore Movemaker’s mission to strengthen the Aptos blockchain ecosystem, particularly in the Chinese-speaking region , and drive Web3 innovation globally. Backed by multimillion-dollar funding and resources from the Aptos Foundation , Movemaker is poised to empower developers, support innovative projects, and foster a thriving blockchain community. “Strong community is the only way for Web3 to fulfill the promise of permissionless networks and decentralized economies. For builders obsessed with this outcome, physical environments like Aptos Space in Hong Kong are game-changers,” said Ash Pampati, Head of Ecosystem at Aptos Foundation. “A hub where developers can collaborate, learn from peers, and access mentorship is critical to ensuring their success.” Empowering Innovation Through the Movemaker Grant Program The Movemaker Grant Program will provide financial, strategic and technical support to projects building on the Aptos blockchain, with a focus on DeFi, AI, payment solutions, stablecoins, and real-world assets (RWAs). In total, Movemaker has set aside US $2 million in grants in the first phase of the rollout of its Grant Program . Movemaker’s core pillars—building, community, and support—are at the heart of this initiative. The grants will help promising projects with: Funding to accelerate development and project growth. Strategic and technical guidance for builders on the Aptos blockchain. Talent and branding support to enhance project visibility and adoption. The Movemaker Grant Program will focus on supporting developers and projects from the Chinese-speaking region while also welcoming global teams interested in this market to join. Interested parties can apply for a grant on movemaker.xyz/grants-program . Aptos Space: A Hub for Builders and Innovators As an additional benefit of the Movemaker Grant Program, grantees will have the chance to co-work and collaborate from Aptos Space – a brand-new physical venue in the heart of Hong Kong. Movemaker will also host regular meetups and developer events at Aptos Space to attract local and global Web3 talent. Movemaker’s Expansion Plans for 2025 Key initiatives for the year ahead include: Ambassador Program: Building a network of champions who share Movemaker’s vision for Web3. Builder-Centric Events: Hosting at least two large-scale builder events in 2025 to unite local Chinese-speaking and global Web3 talent. Collaborations: Partnering with government bodies, media, and community leaders to amplify Aptos’ impact in and beyond the blockchain space. Community Engagement: Regular online events and AMAs to keep the Aptos community informed and inspired. Become a Movemaker Movemaker invites developers, innovators, and industry partners to join its mission to revolutionize blockchain technology and Web3 adoption. The initiative offers opportunities for builders seeking grants, entrepreneurs interested in collaboration, and community members looking to contribute, serving as a gateway to the Aptos ecosystem. For more information, users can visit movemaker.xyz or follow Movemaker on X: @MovemakerCN and @MovemakerEN . About Movemaker Movemaker is an official Aptos community organization focused on advancing the development and growth of the Aptos ecosystem in the Chinese-speaking region. As the official representative of Aptos in this key market, Movemaker has received millions of dollars in funding and resources from the Aptos Foundation. By integrating resources, empowering communities, and providing technical support, Movemaker aims to accelerate the adoption and prosperity of Aptos. Movemaker is co-launched by Ankaa Labs and BlockBooster . About Aptos Foundation Aptos Foundation is dedicated to supporting the development of the Aptos protocol, decentralized network and driving engagement with the Aptos ecosystem. By unlocking a blockchain with seamless usability, Aptos Foundation aims to bring the benefits of decentralization to the masses. Contact PR Annie Movemaker contact@movemaker.xyz

title: Bitcoin Miner Selling Still Elevated, On-Chain Data Shows
body: On-chain data shows the Bitcoin miners have continued to make large deposits to exchanges recently, a sign that could be bearish for BTC’s price. Bitcoin Miner Exchange Netflow Has Been Seeing Positive Spikes In a new post on X, CryptoQuant author IT Tech has discussed about the latest trend in the Bitcoin Miner to Exchange Flow vs. Exchange To Miner Flow metric. This indicator measures, as its name suggests, the netflow happening between miner-associated wallets and centralized exchanges. When the value of this metric is positive, it means the miners are depositing a net number of tokens to these platforms. Generally, these chain validators transfer to the exchanges whenever they want to sell, so this kind of trend can have a bearish impact on the asset’s price. Related Reading: Bitcoin Resets With 14% Deleveraging—Here’s What Past Events Led To On the other hand, the indicator having a negative value implies the the miner exchange outflows are outweighing the miner exchange inflows. Such a trend suggests this cohort may be accumulating, which can naturally be bullish for BTC. Now, here is the chart that shows the trend in the Bitcoin Miner to Exchange Flow vs. Exchange To Miner Flow over the last year: As displayed in the above graph, the indicator has been registering significant positive values since the bull rally from the last couple of months of 2024, implying miners have been depositing big to these platforms. The metric has also been flagging some net outflows during this period, but the scale of them has been significantly lesser compared to the net inflows. Given that the deposits started when the rally began, it would appear likely that the motivation behind them was for profit-taking purposes. Recently, though, bullish momentum has seen a cooldown and BTC’s price has declined, but the miner inflows have nonetheless continued. It’s possible that this group is now just panic selling, in fear of a bear market. Miners are entities that regularly participate in distribution, due to the fact that they have constant running costs in the form of electricity bills that they have to pay off somehow. Usually, this selling isn’t of a scale that can’t be absorbed by the market, so Bitcoin doesn’t tend to be affected much by it. In the periods where miner selling is significant, however, BTC can indeed suffer from a bearish setback. Compared to during the rally last year, miner inflows are currently lower, but are of a notable level nonetheless. “If miner selling accelerates, it could introduce short-term volatility into the market,” notes the analyst. Related Reading: Is Bitcoin Peak In? This Data Suggests Otherwise, Analytics Firm Says It now remains to be seen what the Bitcoin miners would do next and whether their potential selling would have any influence on the asset or not. BTC Price At the time of writing, Bitcoin is floating around $83,400, up almost 6% in the last seven days. Featured image from Dall-E, CryptoQuant.com, chart from TradingView.com
tags: Bitcoin News|bitcoin|Bitcoin Miner Selling|bitcoin miners|Bitcoin On-Chain Data|Bitcoin Selling|btc|BTCUSDT

title: Groundbreaking $5 Million Seed Investment Ignites Opinion Labs’ Prediction Market Revolution
body: Exciting news is making waves in the crypto sphere! Opinion Labs, a platform focused on blockchain-based prediction markets, has just announced a significant milestone in its journey. They’ve successfully closed a $5 million seed funding round, setting the stage for accelerated growth and innovation in the decentralized prediction space. Let’s dive into what this seed investment means for Opinion Labs and the broader crypto ecosystem. What’s the Buzz About Opinion Labs’ Seed Investment? The announcement, made via X (formerly Twitter), reveals that this crucial seed investment round was spearheaded by YZi Labs, previously known as Binance Labs, a prominent player in the crypto venture capital world. This leadership from YZi Labs signals strong confidence in Opinion Labs’ vision and potential. But they weren’t alone. A robust consortium of investors also participated, including: Echo, a crypto angel investment platform known for backing promising early-stage projects. Animoca Ventures, a powerhouse in the blockchain gaming and NFT space, bringing expertise in digital collectibles and decentralized entertainment. Manifold, an NFT issuance platform, suggesting potential integrations with NFTs within Opinion Labs’ platform. Amber Group, a global digital asset platform, indicating strategic partnerships and market access. This diverse and influential group of investors underscores the broad appeal and potential of Opinion Labs within various sectors of the crypto industry. While the specific use of the funds wasn’t explicitly detailed in the announcement, it’s safe to assume this capital injection will fuel key areas like platform development, team expansion, marketing initiatives, and strategic partnerships. Why Prediction Markets and Why Now? Prediction markets , at their core, are exchange-traded markets where participants can trade contracts that pay out based on the outcome of future events. Think of it as placing bets, but in a more structured and transparent environment, often leveraging blockchain technology for decentralization and security. Why are prediction markets gaining traction now, especially within the crypto space? Decentralization and Transparency: Blockchain technology enables prediction markets to operate without central intermediaries, fostering greater transparency and reducing the risk of manipulation. Information Aggregation: Prediction markets are powerful tools for aggregating information and gauging public sentiment on future events. The collective wisdom of the crowd can often be surprisingly accurate. Hedging and Risk Management: Businesses and individuals can utilize prediction markets to hedge against future uncertainties and manage risks across various domains. Engagement and Gamification: The inherently engaging nature of prediction markets, combined with crypto incentives, can drive user participation and create vibrant communities. Data-Driven Insights: The data generated by prediction markets offers valuable insights into market sentiment, potential trends, and future outcomes, applicable across various industries. Opinion Labs is positioning itself to capitalize on these growing trends, building a platform that leverages the strengths of blockchain to create a robust and user-friendly prediction markets ecosystem. YZi Labs Leading the Charge: What Does it Mean for Opinion Labs? Having YZi Labs (formerly Binance Labs) lead this seed investment round is a significant vote of confidence for Opinion Labs. YZi Labs has a track record of identifying and supporting promising blockchain projects that go on to become industry leaders. Their involvement brings more than just capital; it offers: Benefit Description Industry Expertise YZi Labs brings deep knowledge of the crypto market, tokenomics, and blockchain technology, guiding Opinion Labs strategically. Network and Connections Access to YZi Labs’ extensive network of partners, exchanges, and industry players, opening doors for collaborations and growth. Reputation and Credibility YZi Labs’ backing enhances Opinion Labs’ credibility and visibility within the crypto community, attracting users and partners. Strategic Guidance YZi Labs can provide valuable insights and mentorship on navigating the complexities of the crypto landscape and scaling a blockchain platform. This strategic partnership with YZi Labs, coupled with the support of other notable investors, positions Opinion Labs for accelerated growth and strengthens its potential to become a leading platform in the decentralized prediction market space. Unlocking Blockchain Innovation in Prediction Markets The blockchain innovation that Opinion Labs is bringing to prediction markets is crucial for several reasons. Traditional prediction markets often face challenges related to: Lack of Transparency: Opaque platforms can lead to concerns about fairness and potential manipulation. Centralization Risks: Centralized operators can be single points of failure and control user funds and data. High Fees and Inefficiencies: Traditional systems can involve intermediaries, leading to higher fees and slower transaction times. Limited Accessibility: Geographic restrictions and regulatory hurdles can limit participation in traditional prediction markets. Blockchain technology addresses these challenges by offering: Transparency and Auditability: All transactions and market outcomes are recorded on a public ledger, ensuring transparency and auditability. Decentralization and Security: Smart contracts and decentralized infrastructure eliminate central points of failure and enhance security. Lower Fees and Faster Transactions: Blockchain can streamline processes and reduce reliance on intermediaries, lowering fees and speeding up transactions. Global Accessibility: Decentralized platforms can be accessible to a global audience, removing geographical barriers. Opinion Labs is leveraging this blockchain innovation to build a platform that is more transparent, secure, efficient, and accessible, potentially democratizing access to prediction markets and unlocking their full potential. Crypto Funding Fuels the Future of Decentralized Predictions This successful crypto funding round for Opinion Labs highlights the continued investor interest in innovative blockchain applications. Despite market fluctuations and regulatory uncertainties, venture capital continues to flow into projects that demonstrate strong potential and address real-world needs within the crypto ecosystem. Crypto funding like this is essential for: Driving Innovation: Capital injection allows projects like Opinion Labs to invest in research and development, pushing the boundaries of blockchain technology. Scaling Growth: Funding enables startups to expand their teams, infrastructure, and marketing efforts, accelerating user adoption and platform growth. Building Robust Ecosystems: Financial resources empower projects to build comprehensive ecosystems, including partnerships, integrations, and community engagement initiatives. Fostering Competition: Increased funding in the crypto space fosters healthy competition, driving innovation and pushing projects to deliver greater value to users. The $5 million raised by Opinion Labs is a testament to the ongoing dynamism of the crypto funding landscape and the belief in the transformative potential of blockchain-based prediction markets. What’s Next for Opinion Labs? While the official announcement didn’t detail the specific roadmap for the funds, we can anticipate that Opinion Labs will focus on several key areas: Platform Development: Enhancing the platform’s features, user interface, and scalability to accommodate growing user demand. Team Expansion: Bringing in more talent across engineering, marketing, and business development to accelerate growth. Strategic Partnerships: Collaborating with other projects and platforms within the crypto ecosystem to expand reach and functionality. Community Building: Focusing on community engagement and building a vibrant ecosystem around the Opinion Labs platform. Marketing and Awareness: Increasing brand visibility and attracting users to the platform through targeted marketing campaigns. The future looks bright for Opinion Labs. With strong investor backing, a compelling vision, and the growing interest in decentralized prediction markets, they are well-positioned to make a significant impact in the crypto space. Keep an eye on this project as they continue to build and innovate! In Conclusion: A Strategic Leap Forward Opinion Labs securing a $5 million seed investment , led by YZi Labs, is more than just a funding announcement; it’s a strategic leap forward for the platform and a strong indicator of the growing potential of blockchain-based prediction markets. With a solid foundation of investors, a clear vision, and the power of blockchain technology, Opinion Labs is poised to revolutionize how we access and utilize prediction markets. This funding round is a significant step towards realizing that vision and further solidifying the role of decentralized platforms in the future of information aggregation and forecasting. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Hashdex, Launcher of World's First XRP ETF, Files with SEC for Six Altcoins Including Solana and AVAX!
body: Following the SEC's approvals for Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, the altcoin ETF race continues at full speed. At this point, while ETF applications for many altcoins such as XRP, Litecoin (LTC) and Solana (SOL) are waiting before the SEC, a new move regarding six altcoins came from asset manager Hashdex. Accordingly, Hashdex has requested permission from the SEC to add more cryptocurrencies to the SEC-approved Nasdaq Crypto Index US ETF (NCIQ), which currently only includes BTC and ETH. Hasdex's request includes the addition of six altcoins to the ETF: Solana, XRP, Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Avalanche (AVAX), Litecoin, and Uniswap (UNI). The ETF, which opened for trading on February 13 after SEC approval, is traded on Nasdaq under the ticker NCIQ. While this ETF can already invest in Bitcoin and Ethereum, it has the distinction of being the first dual-asset (BTC and ETH) ETF in the US. While the total assets of the Hasdex Bitcoin, Ethereum ETF are around $70 million, 88 percent of it is BTC and 12 percent is ETH. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Hashdex, Launcher of World's First XRP ETF, Files with SEC for Six Altcoins Including Solana and AVAX!

title: Aptos Movemaker Launches US$2 Million Grant Program and Exclusive Co-Working Space for Builders in Hong Kong
body: Hong Kong, Hong Kong, March 18th, 2025, Chainwire Movemaker , the official community organization of the Aptos Foundation dedicated to advancing the Aptos ecosystem in Chinese-speaking regions, has announced the launch of Movemaker Grant Program and the opening of Aptos Space, a state-of-the-art collaboration hub in Hong Kong. These initiatives underscore Movemaker’s mission to strengthen the Aptos blockchain ecosystem, particularly in the Chinese-speaking region , and drive Web3 innovation globally. Backed by multimillion-dollar funding and resources from the Aptos Foundation , Movemaker is poised to empower developers, support innovative projects, and foster a thriving blockchain community. "Strong community is the only way for Web3 to fulfill the promise of permissionless networks and decentralized economies. For builders obsessed with this outcome, physical environments like Aptos Space in Hong Kong are game-changers," said Ash Pampati, Head of Ecosystem at Aptos Foundation. "A hub where developers can collaborate, learn from peers, and access mentorship is critical to ensuring their success." Empowering Innovation Through the Movemaker Grant Program The Movemaker Grant Program will provide financial, strategic and technical support to projects building on the Aptos blockchain, with a focus on DeFi, AI, payment solutions, stablecoins, and real-world assets (RWAs). In total, Movemaker has set aside US $2 million in grants in the first phase of the rollout of its Grant Program . Movemaker’s core pillars—building, community, and support—are at the heart of this initiative. The grants will help promising projects with: Funding to accelerate development and project growth. Strategic and technical guidance for builders on the Aptos blockchain. Talent and branding support to enhance project visibility and adoption. The Movemaker Grant Program will focus on supporting developers and projects from the Chinese-speaking region while also welcoming global teams interested in this market to join. Interested parties can apply for a grant on movemaker.xyz/grants-program . Aptos Space: A Hub for Builders and Innovators As an additional benefit of the Movemaker Grant Program, grantees will have the chance to co-work and collaborate from Aptos Space - a brand-new physical venue in the heart of Hong Kong. Movemaker will also host regular meetups and developer events at Aptos Space to attract local and global Web3 talent. Movemaker’s Expansion Plans for 2025 Key initiatives for the year ahead include: Ambassador Program: Building a network of champions who share Movemaker’s vision for Web3. Builder-Centric Events: Hosting at least two large-scale builder events in 2025 to unite local Chinese-speaking and global Web3 talent. Collaborations: Partnering with government bodies, media, and community leaders to amplify Aptos’ impact in and beyond the blockchain space. Community Engagement: Regular online events and AMAs to keep the Aptos community informed and inspired. Become a Movemaker Movemaker invites developers, innovators, and industry partners to join its mission to revolutionize blockchain technology and Web3 adoption. The initiative offers opportunities for builders seeking grants, entrepreneurs interested in collaboration, and community members looking to contribute, serving as a gateway to the Aptos ecosystem. For more information, users can visit movemaker.xyz or follow Movemaker on X: @MovemakerCN and @MovemakerEN . About Movemaker Movemaker is an official Aptos community organization focused on advancing the development and growth of the Aptos ecosystem in the Chinese-speaking region. As the official representative of Aptos in this key market, Movemaker has received millions of dollars in funding and resources from the Aptos Foundation. By integrating resources, empowering communities, and providing technical support, Movemaker aims to accelerate the adoption and prosperity of Aptos. Movemaker is co-launched by Ankaa Labs and BlockBooster . About Aptos Foundation Aptos Foundation is dedicated to supporting the development of the Aptos protocol, decentralized network and driving engagement with the Aptos ecosystem. By unlocking a blockchain with seamless usability, Aptos Foundation aims to bring the benefits of decentralization to the masses. Contact PR Annie Movemaker contact@movemaker.xyz

title: Unveiling the $2.32M BLUR Token Deposit: Is Blur Treasury’s Coinbase Prime Move a Strategic Power Play?
body: In a captivating turn of events in the crypto world, on-chain data has revealed a significant movement of digital assets. Blur Treasury, a key player in the NFT marketplace ecosystem, has deposited a substantial amount of BLUR tokens into Coinbase Prime. This development, first highlighted by astute on-chain analyst @EmberCN, has sparked considerable discussion and speculation within the cryptocurrency community. Let’s delve into the details of this intriguing transaction and explore its potential implications for the market and holders of BLUR tokens . What’s Behind the Blur Treasury’s Massive Crypto Deposits into Coinbase Prime? According to reports, approximately four hours prior to the news breaking, Blur Treasury transferred 21.69 million unlocked BLUR tokens , valued at a staggering $2.32 million, to Coinbase Prime. This single transaction is noteworthy in itself, but it’s part of a larger, more revealing pattern. Since June 15, 2023, when Blur initiated its monthly token unlock schedule, a colossal 1.044 billion BLUR tokens , representing 35% of the total supply, have been released. The consistent destination for all these unlocked tokens? Coinbase Prime. To put this into perspective, the total value of BLUR tokens deposited into Coinbase Prime over these months amounts to a massive $337 million. This begs the question: what is the strategic rationale behind Blur Treasury’s consistent and substantial crypto deposits into Coinbase Prime? Unpacking the Numbers: Key Statistics at a Glance Let’s break down the key figures to fully grasp the scale of these transactions: Recent Deposit: 21.69 million BLUR tokens Value of Recent Deposit: $2.32 million Total BLUR Unlocked Since June 15, 2023: 1.044 billion BLUR tokens (35% of total supply) Total Value of Unlocked BLUR: $337 million Destination for All Unlocked BLUR: Coinbase Prime These numbers paint a clear picture of a deliberate and large-scale movement of BLUR tokens . But what exactly is Coinbase Prime, and why is Blur Treasury choosing it for these significant crypto deposits ? Coinbase Prime: More Than Just an Exchange for BLUR Tokens Coinbase Prime is not your average cryptocurrency exchange platform. It’s a sophisticated institutional-grade platform designed for corporations, hedge funds, and high-net-worth individuals. It offers a suite of services that go far beyond simple trading, including: Custody Solutions: Secure and regulated storage for large amounts of digital assets. This is crucial for treasuries managing substantial token holdings like Blur Treasury . Advanced Trading Tools: Access to sophisticated trading algorithms and execution services, enabling efficient and potentially less market-impactful trading of BLUR tokens . Prime Brokerage Services: Offering services like lending, borrowing, and reporting, essential for institutional-level financial management of crypto deposits . OTC (Over-the-Counter) Trading: Facilitating large-volume trades directly between parties, bypassing public order books and minimizing price slippage, particularly beneficial for moving large quantities of BLUR tokens . Given these features, Blur Treasury’s choice of Coinbase Prime suggests a strategic approach to managing and potentially utilizing these unlocked BLUR tokens . It’s highly unlikely that such a move is solely for simple selling on the open market, considering the potential price impact of such large volumes. Decoding the Strategy: What Could Blur Treasury Be Planning with These BLUR Tokens? The consistent flow of BLUR tokens into Coinbase Prime raises several intriguing possibilities. While the exact intentions of Blur Treasury remain undisclosed, we can explore some plausible scenarios: Staking or Yield Generation: Coinbase Prime may offer staking or yield-generating opportunities for BLUR tokens . By depositing tokens, Blur Treasury could be aiming to earn passive income on their holdings, increasing their overall returns. OTC Sales to Institutional Investors: Coinbase Prime’s OTC desk could be facilitating private sales of BLUR tokens to institutional investors. This would allow Blur Treasury to offload tokens in large blocks without causing significant price drops on public exchanges. This could be a strategic move to diversify holdings or secure funding for future developments. Liquidity Provision for Market Making: Blur Treasury might be working with market makers on Coinbase Prime to provide liquidity for the BLUR token market. By depositing tokens, they could be enabling smoother trading and potentially reducing volatility. Preparation for Future Ecosystem Initiatives: The deposited tokens could be earmarked for future ecosystem development, partnerships, or strategic acquisitions. Having a readily available reserve of BLUR tokens on a platform like Coinbase Prime provides flexibility for swift action when opportunities arise. Hedging or Risk Management: In a more complex scenario, Blur Treasury could be using Coinbase Prime’s sophisticated financial tools to hedge against market volatility or manage risks associated with their BLUR token holdings. It’s important to note that these are speculative scenarios, and the actual reason could be a combination of these or something entirely different. However, the scale and consistency of these crypto deposits strongly suggest a well-thought-out strategy rather than random or impulsive actions. Impact on the BLUR Token Market: Will We See Price Volatility? The movement of such a significant portion of the BLUR token supply naturally raises concerns about potential price volatility. The market’s reaction to these crypto deposits can be influenced by various factors: Market Sentiment: Overall market sentiment towards cryptocurrencies and NFTs will play a role. Positive sentiment could absorb selling pressure more easily, while negative sentiment could exacerbate price drops. Transparency and Communication from Blur: If Blur Treasury provides clarity on their intentions, it could mitigate uncertainty and reduce speculative selling. Lack of communication could lead to increased anxiety and potential price declines. Absorption Capacity of Coinbase Prime: Coinbase Prime’s ability to handle the volume of BLUR tokens without causing market disruptions is crucial. Their institutional-grade infrastructure is designed for large transactions, but significant selling pressure could still impact the price. Trader and Investor Behavior: How traders and investors react to this news will be a key determinant of price movement. Fear of potential dumping could trigger sell-offs, while belief in Blur Treasury’s long-term strategy could lead to buying opportunities. Historically, large token unlocks can sometimes lead to increased selling pressure. However, the fact that these BLUR tokens are being deposited into Coinbase Prime, rather than directly onto public exchanges, suggests a more controlled and potentially less market-disruptive approach. It signals that Blur Treasury is likely considering the market impact and opting for a more strategic execution. Actionable Insights: What Does This Mean for BLUR Token Holders and the NFT Space? For those holding BLUR tokens or interested in the NFT space, this development offers several key takeaways and actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on official announcements from Blur and any further on-chain data regarding these crypto deposits . Transparency will be crucial in understanding the implications. Monitor Market Sentiment: Pay attention to market sentiment surrounding BLUR tokens and the broader NFT market. News and community discussions can provide clues about potential price movements. Consider Long-Term Strategy: Evaluate your investment strategy based on your risk tolerance and long-term outlook for Blur and the NFT market. Short-term volatility might present buying opportunities for those with a bullish long-term view. Diversification: As always, diversification remains a sound strategy in the volatile crypto market. Avoid putting all your eggs in one basket and spread your investments across different assets. Understand Coinbase Prime’s Role: Recognizing Coinbase Prime as an institutional platform provides context to Blur Treasury’s actions. It suggests a strategic, rather than purely reactive, approach to managing their token holdings. The Blur Treasury’s consistent crypto deposits into Coinbase Prime are undoubtedly a significant event in the BLUR token ecosystem. While the precise motivations remain under wraps, the scale and strategic nature of these transactions point towards a calculated approach to managing their token supply and potentially positioning themselves for future growth and development within the NFT space. Conclusion: A Strategic Move or a Looming Liquidation? The $2.32 million BLUR token deposit into Coinbase Prime, part of a larger $337 million trend, is more than just a routine transaction. It’s a strategic maneuver by Blur Treasury that warrants close attention. Whether this is a power play to fuel future growth, a calculated move for institutional sales, or something else entirely remains to be seen. For now, the crypto world watches, analyzes on-chain data, and speculates on the next chapter in the BLUR token saga. The coming weeks and months will likely reveal more about the true intentions behind these crypto deposits and their ultimate impact on the BLUR token market and the wider NFT landscape. This massive token movement is a powerful reminder of the dynamic and often unpredictable nature of the cryptocurrency market, where strategic treasury management can significantly influence token ecosystems. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action.

title: Swiss cantonal bank starts offering Cardano and Avalanche to meet increased demand
body: Swiss bank Zuger Kantonalbank has added Cardano and Avalanche to its cryptocurrency offering through a partnership with crypto-focused bank Sygnum. Zuger Kantonalbank, a Swiss universal bank, has expanded its cryptocurrency offerings to include Cardano ( ADA ) and Avalanche ( AVAX ) through a partnership with crypto-focused Swiss bank Sygnum. In a blog announcement on March 17, Sygnum said the expansion was driven by “increased customer demand” amid what it described as growing regulatory clarity in the U.S. and E.U., as well as the establishment of a U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve. The bank’s fiat-to-crypto transactions are facilitated through Sygnum’s gateway, while Zuger Kantonalbank customers can access the service via e-banking and its mobile app. Jan Damrau, head of corporate management and member of the Zuger Kantonalbank executive board, says the addition of ADA and AVAX enables the bank’s clients to “further develop their crypto portfolios conveniently with their principal bank – at a time when digital assets are approaching a global inflection point in terms of adoption.” “The latest expansion of Zuger Kantonalbank’s token universe illustrates the strong demand for additional tokens with diverse use-cases to complement major protocols like Bitcoin and Ethereum.” Fritz Jost, Sygnum Bank chief B2B officer In early January, Sygnum raised $58 million in its Strategic Growth Round, pushing its value to over $1 billion and making it a “unicorn.” The funding round was oversubscribed, with Fulgur Ventures, a Bitcoin-focused venture capital firm, as the cornerstone investor. New and existing investors, along with Sygnum team members, also participated in the funding. Read more: Swiss crypto bank Sygnum adds Deribit into off-exchange custody platform

title: Filecoin price prediction 2025-2031: What’s the future for FIL?
body: Key takeaways : Filecoin price predictions suggest an average market price of $4.62 in 2025. By 2028, the price is projected to reach $16.48. By 2031, FIL may reach $53.54. Filecoin is a decentralized storage network designed to securely and efficiently store humanity’s most important information. Launched by Protocol Labs in October 2020, it utilizes blockchain technology to create a peer-to-peer digital storage marketplace. Users can rent unused hard drive space to earn Filecoin tokens (FIL), the network’s native cryptocurrency. The system operates on a proof-of-replication and proof-of-spacetime consensus mechanism, ensuring that data is reliably stored over time and that storage providers hold the exact copies they claim. This approach incentivizes a robust and distributed network of storage providers, enhancing data retrieval speeds and security compared to traditional centralized servers. Filecoin aims to reduce the costs of storage services by leveraging the global surplus of storage capacity. As part of the broader Web3 ecosystem, it supports decentralized applications (dApps) and services requiring secure, decentralized data storage solutions, significantly advancing decentralized internet infrastructure. Filecoin is a decentralized storage network aiming to revolutionize data storage. Its investment potential depends on market adoption and competition. Like all cryptocurrencies, it carries significant risks due to volatility. Investors should carefully research and assess their risk tolerance before considering investing. What will Filecoin be worth in 2025? Filecoin is predicted to reach a high of $5.20, with an average price of $4.62 by 2025. How high can Filecoin go? Filecoin (FIL) has the potential for significant price appreciation, especially if adoption increases within the decentralized storage sector. Historically, FIL reached an all-time high of $236.84 in 2021, but its price has since retraced significantly. Looking forward, realistic long-term projections depend on market conditions, demand for decentralized storage, and crypto adoption. In a bullish scenario, FIL could reach $5 by 2025 if institutional interest and on-chain activity increase. More optimistic forecasts suggest $50+ in the next major bull run. However, market risks remain, and sustained growth depends on ecosystem developments and competitive advantages over traditional cloud storage solutions. Can Filecoin reach 100 dollars? Filecoin (FIL) reaching $100 is possible, but it would require significant market momentum, adoption, and favorable conditions in the broader crypto space. The token previously hit an all-time high of $236.84 in 2021, proving that such price levels are achievable during bullish cycles. For FIL to reach $100 again, it would need strong institutional adoption, increased demand for decentralized storage solutions, and a broader crypto bull market. However, competition from traditional cloud providers and other blockchain-based storage networks could limit growth. Filecoin’s future appears promising due to its unique position in decentralized data storage, addressing the growing demand for secure alternatives to traditional cloud services. Filecoin employs cryptographic security for its decentralized storage network and robust security protocols, including cryptographic proof for data integrity, but it is not without risks. Potential issues include market volatility, regulatory uncertainty, and technical vulnerabilities. Users should thoroughly research and exercise caution when using or investing in Filecoin. Is Filecoin built on Ethereum? Filecoin is not built on Ethereum; it operates on its blockchain. However, it has integrated with Ethereum to enhance functionality, enabling smart contracts and facilitating interactions between the two ecosystems. Trading started long before the Filecoin mainnet was released. Between December 2017 and May 2020, FIL traded below $30. Then, starting mid-May, the Filecoin price started rising, and the bull trend continued until 01st April 2021, when it hit its highest price of $237.24. After hitting its all-time high in mid-May 2021, Filecoin took a bearish turn, which continued until mid-July when the market turned bullish again. Filecoin (FIL) experienced notable price fluctuations between 2022 and 2023. Starting 2022 at a higher value, FIL’s price declined amidst the broader crypto market downturn. title: Bitcoin Storm Could Be Brewing, Crypto OnChain Options Platform Derive Says
body: The calm that has returned to the bitcoin (BTC) market may be short-lived, potentially setting the stage for a storm that could trigger significant price volatility, according to insights from the decentralized crypto on-chain options platform Derive . Since March 12, BTC has settled in the $80K-$85K range in a consolidation typically seen after a notable directional move. Prices tanked from $100K to under $80K in preceding weeks due to several factors, including President Donald Trump's tariffs and disappointment about the lack of new purchases in the U.S. strategic BTC reserve. With the latest consolidation, key volatility metrics have declined, nearing monthly lows. Volatility, however, is mean-reverting, meaning the low-volatility regime could soon pave the way for price turbulence, according to Derive. "BTC’s weekly at-the-money (ATM) volatility has dipped below 50% to 49%, approaching monthly lows of 45%. Realized volatility has also dropped from 91% at the start of the month to 54% today," Nick Forster, founder of Derive, wrote in a recent note shared with CoinDesk. It is important to remember that volatility is price agnostic, meaning that the expected increase in volatility does not indicate the direction of the price movement in bitcoin. “Volatility is mean-reverting, so we can expect it to rise soon, likely to levels seen in February (60-70%)," Forster added. Whether prices rise or fall, volatility can increase, suggesting that significant price swings could occur in either direction. According to Derive, several factors could trigger volatility, including "a ceasefire (or lack thereof) in Ukraine, or significant shifts in crypto regulatory policy under the Trump administration." Derive is the world's leading on-chain AI-powered options protocol with a total value locked of nearly $100 million. The protocol has registered a cumulative trading volume of $15 billion to date. Wednesday's Federal Reserve rate decision could move markets as well. The central bank is likely to keep rates unchanged, with traders pricing two to three rate cuts later this year. But a dovish surprise could recharge bulls' engines for a sharp move higher. Potential Fed rate cuts, however, could be limited, according to BlackRock. "Markets have priced in about two to three 25 basis point rate cuts this year, versus expectations for just one earlier this year. We think this reflects U.S. recession fears even though economic condition don’t point to a downturn. Even if prolonged uncertainty hurts growth, we still see persistent inflation limiting how much the Fed can cut," BlackRock said in a weekly note. The expected volatility boom could happen to the downside should equity markets continue to fall, accelerating the decline in crypto prices.

title: Metaplanet Continues Bond Issuance for Bitcoin Buys
body: Japan's Metaplanet has issued more zero-interest bonds as the listed company looks to asquire more bitcoin (BTC). The company said today in a notice to shareholders that it issued 2 billion yen ($13.4 million) in zero-interest ordinary bonds for buying BTC, with Evo fund once again acting as the sole bondholder. These bonds carry no interest and will be redeemed in full on Sept. 17. These bond issuances are a regular occurrence for the listed company as Metaplanet continues to increase its bitcoin reserves, taking advantage of cheaper pricing brought by BTC's recent price correction. Last week, the company announced it had acquired 162 BTC for $13.5 million at an average price of $83,123 per bitcoin. With all its recent buys, Metaplanet now holds 3200 BTC, worth $265 million, which makes it the tenth-largest BTC-holding public entity, according to bitcointreasuries.net.

title: Top Altcoins to Watch in 2025: Expert Picks & Bitcoin’s Next Move
body: The post Top Altcoins to Watch in 2025: Expert Picks & Bitcoin’s Next Move appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto market held steady, dipping just 0.5% as big players like Bitcoin and Ethereum stayed calm. The total market cap sits at $2.72T, down 0.45%, with trading volume hitting $72.59B in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and altcoins are at a turning point, and according to Altcoin Daily, history shows that tough times create big opportunities. They predict a massive surge before 2025, driven by growing institutional interest, media hype, and clearer regulations. Why Crypto’s Future Looks Bright The analyst believes we are near a local market bottom, making this the perfect accumulation phase before a major rally. Several catalysts, including mainstream media attention, institutional involvement, and favorable US policies, indicate that crypto is far from over. BlackRock and Wall Street’s increasing participation, along with bullish narratives from major financial outlets like CNBC and Fox News, are strong green flags for Bitcoin’s long-term growth. In a recent interview with Lara Trump, Michael Saylor, shared his journey from doubting Bitcoin to strongly supporting it as “digital gold.” He explained that Bitcoin isn’t just an investment but a major technological shift. With its fixed supply and resistance to control, he sees it as a key financial tool, especially during economic uncertainty and growing concerns about traditional banking systems. Saylor further emphasized Bitcoin’s dominance, describing it as the “safest bank in the world.” He pointed out that institutions, banks, and even governments will eventually embrace Bitcoin as a strategic reserve asset. Saylor believes that tech giants like Apple, Google, and Microsoft will integrate Bitcoin into their systems, further cementing its place as a global financial standard. Another notable perspective came from financial experts and former government officials, who highlighted the US’s past missteps in selling Bitcoin holdings at undervalued prices. With lawmakers now pushing for smarter regulations, there’s a growing effort to make the US a crypto hub, further fueling long-term bullish sentiment. Top 11 Coins to Watch for April 2025 Despite the hype around altcoins, Bitcoin tops the list as the most dominant asset. Analysts acknowledge that this cycle is Bitcoin-driven, not Ethereum-led. However, Ethereum remains a solid pick, with potential upside even though Standard Chartered has lowered its year-end target from $10K to $4K. Other top picks include Avalanche and Mantle, which have seen major institutional backing, particularly from the Trump-affiliated World Liberty Finance. XRP, Cardano, Solana, and Chainlink also made the list due to growing institutional adoption, including their inclusion in Hashdex’s Crypto Index ETF. Meanwhile, Injective is also making waves in DeFi, Kaspa is gaining traction for its innovative blockchain model, and Dogecoin remains a community favorite with potential mainstream adoption. Final Thoughts With liquidity returning to the market, analysts remain highly optimistic about the next bull run. They stress that while Bitcoin will lead, however only selective altcoins will survive as adoption increases. Institutional support, regulatory clarity, and media-driven exposure are setting the stage for an explosive 2025. Will this be the last great buying opportunity before a crypto explosion? Analysts believe it might be.

title: Aptos Movemaker Launches US$2 Million Grant Program and Exclusive Co-Working Space for Builders in Hong Kong
body: March 18th, 2025 – Hong Kong Movemaker , the official community organization of the Aptos Foundation dedicated to advancing the Aptos ecosystem in Chinese-speaking regions, has announced the launch of Movemaker Grant Program and the opening of Aptos Space, a state-of-the-art collaboration hub in Hong Kong. These initiatives underscore Movemaker’s mission to strengthen the Aptos blockchain ecosystem, particularly in the Chinese-speaking region , and drive Web3 innovation globally. Backed by multimillion-dollar funding and resources from the Aptos Foundation , Movemaker is poised to empower developers, support innovative projects, and foster a thriving blockchain community. “Strong community is the only way for Web3 to fulfill the promise of permissionless networks and decentralized economies. For builders obsessed with this outcome, physical environments like Aptos Space in Hong Kong are game-changers,” said Ash Pampati, Head of Ecosystem at Aptos Foundation. “A hub where developers can collaborate, learn from peers, and access mentorship is critical to ensuring their success.” Empowering Innovation Through the Movemaker Grant Program The Movemaker Grant Program will provide financial, strategic and technical support to projects building on the Aptos blockchain, with a focus on DeFi, AI, payment solutions, stablecoins, and real-world assets (RWAs). In total, Movemaker has set aside US $2 million in grants in the first phase of the rollout of its Grant Program . Movemaker’s core pillars—building, community, and support—are at the heart of this initiative. The grants will help promising projects with: Funding to accelerate development and project growth. Strategic and technical guidance for builders on the Aptos blockchain. Talent and branding support to enhance project visibility and adoption. The Movemaker Grant Program will focus on supporting developers and projects from the Chinese-speaking region while also welcoming global teams interested in this market to join. Interested parties can apply for a grant on movemaker.xyz/grants-program . Aptos Space: A Hub for Builders and Innovators As an additional benefit of the Movemaker Grant Program, grantees will have the chance to co-work and collaborate from Aptos Space – a brand-new physical venue in the heart of Hong Kong. Movemaker will also host regular meetups and developer events at Aptos Space to attract local and global Web3 talent. Movemaker’s Expansion Plans for 2025 Key initiatives for the year ahead include: Ambassador Program: Building a network of champions who share Movemaker’s vision for Web3. Builder-Centric Events: Hosting at least two large-scale builder events in 2025 to unite local Chinese-speaking and global Web3 talent. Collaborations: Partnering with government bodies, media, and community leaders to amplify Aptos’ impact in and beyond the blockchain space. Community Engagement: Regular online events and AMAs to keep the Aptos community informed and inspired. Become a Movemaker Movemaker invites developers, innovators, and industry partners to join its mission to revolutionize blockchain technology and Web3 adoption. The initiative offers opportunities for builders seeking grants, entrepreneurs interested in collaboration, and community members looking to contribute, serving as a gateway to the Aptos ecosystem. For more information, users can visit movemaker.xyz or follow Movemaker on X: @MovemakerCN and @MovemakerEN . About Movemaker Movemaker is an official Aptos community organization focused on advancing the development and growth of the Aptos ecosystem in the Chinese-speaking region. As the official representative of Aptos in this key market, Movemaker has received millions of dollars in funding and resources from the Aptos Foundation. By integrating resources, empowering communities, and providing technical support, Movemaker aims to accelerate the adoption and prosperity of Aptos. Movemaker is co-launched by Ankaa Labs and BlockBooster . About Aptos Foundation Aptos Foundation is dedicated to supporting the development of the Aptos protocol, decentralized network and driving engagement with the Aptos ecosystem. By unlocking a blockchain with seamless usability, Aptos Foundation aims to bring the benefits of decentralization to the masses. Contact PR Annie Movemaker contact@movemaker.xyz This content is sponsored and should be regarded as promotional material. Opinions and statements expressed herein are those of the author and do not reflect the opinions of The Daily Hodl. Please be advised that your investments are at your own risk, and any losses you may incur are your responsibility.
